ProductInfo.Features:

<8> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <9> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <10> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<12> HB-45 Lens Hood + <13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <15> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
